pages.md:
# Film Simulation

Simulate the effects of different kinds of film, including black-and-white (with or without color filters). Choose a palette according to your subject and creative intent.

| Option            | Description                                                                 |
|-------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| !Auto Icon **AUTO**            | The camera will automatically select the best film simulation mode according to the scene. This option is available when the mode dial is set to AUTO. |
| !Provia/Standard Icon **PROVIA/STANDARD** | Ideal for a wide range of subjects.                                               |
| !Velvia/Vivid Icon **Velvia/VIVID**     | Vibrant reproduction, ideal for landscape and nature.                             |
| !Astia/Soft Icon **ASTIA/SOFT**        | Softer color and contrast for a more subdued look.                                |
| !Classic Chrome Icon **CLASSIC CHROME** | Soft color and enhanced shadow contrast for a calm look.                          |
| !Pro Neg. Hi Icon **PRO Neg. Hi**      | Ideal for portrait with slightly enhanced contrast.                               |
| !Pro Neg. Std Icon **PRO Neg. Std**    | Ideal for portrait with soft gradations and skin tones.                           |
| !Classic Neg. Icon **CLASSIC Neg.**    | Enhanced color with hard tonality to increase image depth.                        |
| !Nostalgic Neg. Icon **NOSTALGIC Neg.**| Amber tinted highlights and rich shadow tone for printed photo look.              |
| !Eterna/Cinema Icon **ETERNA/CINEMA**  | Soft color and rich shadow tone suitable for film look movie.                     |
| !Eterna Bleach Bypass Icon **ETERNA BLEACH BYPASS** | Unique color with low saturation and high contrast. Suitable for still and movie. |
